titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Class of 1872 (University of Michigan) records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

physdesc.extent: 2 v. and 3 linear in. in 1 box and 1 oversize folder

archdesc.scopecontent: Record book, 1868-1874, with minutes of meetings and lists of members and officers; volume of essays, mainly scientific, of class members; files of class secretaries, Edwin I. Ayer and Russel F. Tinkham, concerning reunions and other class activities; class poem, oration and prophecy; and obituary notices and memorials of class members.

physdesc.extent: 2 v. and 3 linear in. in 1 box and 1 oversize folder

c01.scopecontent: Record book, 1868-1874, with minutes of meetings and lists of members and officers; volume of essays, mainly scientific, of class members; files of class secretaries, Edwin I. Ayer and Russel F. Tinkham, concerning reunions and other class activities; class poem, oration and prophecy; and obituary notices and memorials of class members.

did.unittitle: University of Michigan, Class of 1872 flag.

c01.scopecontent: Flag (on silk) commemorating the class of 1872 of the University of Michigan.
